title: Ticket #7628: Fix docs,comments,code refs of 8.9.6 to 8.9.7 due to security release
description:
Because of the latest security release a lot of docs and comments say 8.9.6 instead of 8.9.7. More importantly, this is a real bug because we do version comparisons in the code for 8.9.6 for forward/backward compatibility checks.

Thought I'd just clean these all up at once.

No such issues were found for 8.8.8/8.8.9.
remarks:
2020-Apr-30 23:33:25 by tim:
CODE REVIEW: Looks good. No docs needed.
check_ins: 2020-Apr-30 16:33   Check-in [59536]: Move mentions of version 8.9.6 forward to 8.9.7 due to the security release. #7628 (By zmiller )
creator: zmiller
